newsitem.title: CROATIA: Croatian stocks mixed, hoteliers higher.
newsitem.headline: Croatian stocks mixed, hoteliers higher.

text.p: Croatian stocks were mixed on Friday, with further gains for some hoteliers.
* Seven of 14 active issues rose, six fell and one was flat. Volume more than halved at 11,099 shares, turnover also lower at 8.6 million kuna.
* Top gainer hotelier Riviera Porec rose 25 kuna to 220, selling 84 shares.
* Biggest decliner Adriatic pipeline Janaf lost 890 kuna to 9,000, with 22 units sold.
* Most actively traded drugs firm Pliva inched down two kuna to 470 on volume of 3,245 shares. -- Zagreb Newsroom, 385-1-4557075
